question: What is the full form of FSAAI?
option1: Food Safety Standards Authority of India
option2: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India
option3: Food Safety and Standards Authorities of India
option4: Future Safety and Standards Authority of India
answer: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India
explanation: FSAAI stands for Food Safety and Standards Authority of India, which is an autonomous body founded in August 2011 under the the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare.
